attributes.action: higher the A level pass rate to C
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: and to scrap the AS an A2 system and bring back the old A level. make the A level exams harder so only 5% of the peole will get grade A and to stop lowering the garde boundries if not many people pass.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
